name: battery-menubar
title: Battery Menu Bar
description: Battery capacity and power-draw information in the Menu Bar
author: panrafal

commands.name: index
commands.title: Show Battery Info in Menu Bar
commands.description: Battery capacity and power-draw information in the Menu Bar

preferences.name: showInfo
preferences.title: Show additional info in Menu Bar
preferences.description: This info will be rendered next to the battery icon

preferences.name: remainingYellow
preferences.title: Optimal remaining time (h)
preferences.description: Battery percentage will turn yellow if there's less than this many hours remaining

preferences.name: remainingOrange
preferences.title: Low remaining time (h)
preferences.description: Battery percentage will turn orange if there's less than this many hours remaining

preferences.name: remainingRed
preferences.title: Critical remaining time (h)
preferences.description: Battery percentage will turn red if there's less than this many hours remaining

preferences.name: highPowerUsage
preferences.title: High power usage (W)
preferences.description: Battery percentage will turn yellow if more than this many watts are being drawn
